description:
Stay in touch with friends and family abroad with a simple, easy to use app! Call any international number with rates starting at 1 US cent per minute. Send international SMS texts at very low rates. Try it now and get up to 30 minutes FREE!

WHAT IS VOXOFON?
Voxofon is an application that allows you to make international calls and send SMS to your friends, family or business relationships abroad - all for FREE or very low call rates.

CAN I TRY IT?
Yes! Download the app now and get up to 30 minutes of free international calling to test the service. Setup takes less than a minute and no credit card or subscription are required!

HOW DO I ADD CALL CREDIT LATER?
You can deposit as much or as little as you need - using either PayPal or a credit card - either from your phone or your computer.

QUALITY, RELIABILITY AND TRUST
Voxofon is one of the most trusted applications for long distance calling, with thousands of happy customers using it every day and recommending it to their friends. We are committed to high quality, responsive service.

FEATURES
* Simple app, very easy to use
* Very low, affordable international call rates - typically lower than any other app
* You pay per minute - no hidden fees, setup costs or subscriptions
* Cost of each call displayed as you enter the number, before you start calling
* Call Skype, SIP, and GTalk users for free
* Works with your existing BlackBerry contacts, no need to re-enter them
* Great call quality
* Fast and efficient customer support
* Works anywhere - no WiFi required

WHAT DO OTHERS SAY?
"Awesome app. A must have. Very convenient."

"I've tried the competition but this is by FAR the BEST, CHEAPEST and EASIEST to use. You know when you are on their system..."

"Excellent app. Flawless so far. Easy to use and cheap. Great product!"

NOTES:
- Caller ID must be enabled
- Will use plan minutes
- Not suitable for use while traveling and roaming
